lead_paragraph: LEAD: To the Editor: While vacationing on the Monterey peninsula in California, I recently took my car on the Seventeen Mile Drive. It turned out to be quite a pretty drive, with some interesting woodland parts mixed with beach vistas. However, I have seen countless (and longer) expanses of coast in other parts of California and throughout the United
